elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Resupply].  At Dusk — You may pay {1}. If you do: Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Resupply], otherwise [Exhausted Resupply].  When my Expedition moves forward — If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: You may discard target Permanent.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} []Target Character gains 1 boost and [[Fleeting]].  {R} You may spend 1 counter from a card you control or in your Reserve. If you do: [Resupply], otherwise [Exhausted Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: [Resupply], otherwise [Exhausted Resupply].  {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Exhausted Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} [][Sabotage].  {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Exhausted Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Exhausted Resupply].  At Dusk — []Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} []Exchange target Card in your Reserve with a card from your hand.  {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} [][Resupply].  {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Resupply], otherwise [Exhausted Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} []I gain 1 boost.  {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Resupply], otherwise [Exhausted Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If your Reserve is empty: I gain 1 boost.  {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: Draw a card, otherwise [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If you control one or more Landmarks: I gain 2 boosts, otherwise I gain 1 boost.  {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: Draw a card, otherwise [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may spend 1 counter from a card you control or in your Reserve. If you do: [Exhausted Resupply].  {H} Roll a die. On a 4+: I gain 1 boost per card in your Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Exhausted Resupply].  When my Expedition moves forward — If you control one or more Landmarks: You may have target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less other than me gain [[Anchored]].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Target Character gains 1 boost and [[Fleeting]].  {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may spend 1 counter from a card you control or in your Reserve. If you do: [Resupply], otherwise [Exhausted Resupply].  {H} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: You may return a card from your Reserve to your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may spend 1 counter from a card you control or in your Reserve. If you do: [Resupply].  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Boosted]] — []Up to two target Characters in play or in Reserve each gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you control one or more Landmarks: The next Character you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.  {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Exhausted Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} Roll a die. On a 4+: I gain 1 boost per card in your Reserve, otherwise I gain 1 boost.  {R} You may spend 1 of my boosts. If you do: [Exhausted Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.
